backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with product, order, vendor, and user types plus maps for storing marketplace data and authorization mixins.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend pages and components.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documentation describing frontend build fixes, TypeScript config setup, and Vite environment shims.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme and CSS variables for light and dark mode color systems.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React app and PWA metadata.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme, and display settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Custom offline fallback page with styled UI and retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching, offline support, and app shell strategy.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the root layout and defines all application routes, including customer, vendor, admin, and onboarding paths with role protection.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminError: React error boundary for admin pages that logs crashes and shows a diagnostics UI with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminNav.t: Navigation bar for admin routes using tab-style links with icons.
frontend/src/components/admin/VendorDocu: Dialog that loads and displays vendor-uploaded documents with view and download actions.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with navigation and layout styling, and auto-redirects vendors after login.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Access denial UI that can show backend initialization errors and trigger access refresh or admin role assignment.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBypass: Wrapper that allows only authenticated users to access admin routes, redirecting unauthenticated users to login.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic session clearing and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to create their profile with basic personal information.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role-based access gate that verifies admin/vendor/customer roles and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a mobile bottom navigation bar that switches items based on user role and shows cart counts.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: Styled primary call-to-action button wrapper around the base UI Button.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Displays a styled product deal card with pricing, discount, image, and navigation to the product page.
frontend/src/components/forms/FloatingLa: Floating input component that pairs a styled Input with a floating Label using peer-focus transitions.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: Implements an auto-rotating, swipeable banner slider linking to store categories.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Renders a grid of product cards with pricing, stock indicators, images, and add-to-cart support.
frontend/src/components/pwa/A2HSInstallB: Displays an install banner for the PWA when installable, providing install and dismiss actions.
frontend/src/components/status/OrderStat: Renders a badge with styling and text based on order status helpers.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Displays the top navigation bar with logo, search, role‑aware actions, and cart status.
frontend/src/components/vendor/EditOutle: Dialog form for editing a vendor’s outlet details, including photo upload and profile update mutation.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorTab: Navigation tabs for vendor pages with active-state styling and icons.
frontend/src/constants/storeCategories.t: Defines store category constants and helper functions for labels, parsing, and slugs.
frontend/src/data/vendors.ts: Provides sample vendor data with basic shop details for testing or display.
frontend/src/hooks/useA2HS.ts: Custom hook managing Add-to-Home-Screen installability, prompting, and install state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Lightweight hook to read actor query state from React Query cache via external store subscription.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider implementing Internet Identity auth lifecycle with login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, admin/vendor checks, and profile mutations tied to the Internet Identity actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes plus marketplace UI utilities like card shadows and transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and feature sections using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnalyticsP: Admin dashboard page displaying vendor, order, sales, and commission analytics using fetched admin data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with navigation cards for vendor management, orders, and quick actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays and filters orders by city, shows order details, and allows updating order status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides a CRUD interface for products, including add, edit, delete, and category selection.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Manages vendors with approval, rejection, outlet status toggling, payment marking, and document viewing.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, merges products with cart items, calculates totals, and handles checkout and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Shows a list of store categories with icons and gradients, linking to category-specific pages.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Filters and sorts products within a selected category and renders them in a product grid.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that displays cart items, calculates totals, and creates an order before clearing the cart and navigating to orders.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page allowing users to submit name, email, and message with simulated async submission and contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Shows the logged‑in customer's profile and role with read‑only personal details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Lists customer orders with status badges, totals, and order metadata.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Displays the user's wishlist by combining wishlist IDs with product data and shows loading skeletons, empty state, and product cards with discounts and stock badges.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero slider, login buttons, product deals, and category cards linking to store categories.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerLo: Provides a customer login form with validation and saves login data before navigating to the vendor list filtered by city.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/OutletDeta: Collects outlet details including photo upload and validates inputs before saving data and navigating to the vendor dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SimpleVend: Shows a vendor dashboard with registration success info and displays vendor and outlet details saved during onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorList: Lists vendors filtered by selected city, with navigation to individual vendor shops and empty states when no city or vendors are available.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorLogi: Provides a vendor login form with validation and stores vendor data before moving to outlet details entry.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorShop: Displays a vendor’s shop details from static data and handles missing-vendor fallback navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Product details page with image carousel, price calculation, add-to-cart handling, and review submission.
frontend/src/pages/store/StoreCategoryVe: Shows vendors by store category with loading, error, and empty states, redirecting on invalid categories.
Displays a vendor’s store profile and lets owners manage products, including add, edit, delete, and image handling.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Vendor dashboard showing product counts, orders, wallet status warnings, and outlet status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Lists vendor orders with status, dates, and totals, including a loading and empty state.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: Allows vendors to view, create, edit, and delete their products using a form and modal dialog.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProfileP: Renders the vendor profile UI showing vendor info, verification, outlet details, and loading states using various UI components.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorWalletPa: Displays vendor wallet balance, outlet status alerts, and sales/commission summaries with loading and limit warnings.
frontend/src/utils/categoryColors.ts: Provides a deterministic hash‑based mapping from category IDs to preset gradient color classes.
frontend/src/utils/categoryMatch.ts: Offers a case‑insensitive lookup to find a category by name from a list.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Extracts readable error messages, formats diagnostics text, and sanitizes long error outputs.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats numeric or bigint values into INR currency strings with safety checks.
frontend/src/utils/maskAadhaar.ts: Masks Aadhaar numbers by replacing all but the last four digits with placeholders.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, and clearing customer, vendor, and outlet onboarding data in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/safeNumbers.ts: Provides safe numeric conversions, formatting, string conversion, and value sanitization utilities.
frontend/src/utils/statusStyles.ts: Maps order and UI statuses to class names and human‑readable text, including stock availability helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL and sessionStorage parameters, including retrieval, persistence, and cleanup functions.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Defines Vite environment types, including optional II URL for ImportMeta.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related files, enabling strict ESNext module settings and including the Vite config.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite setup with React plugin, path aliases, environment shims, custom build chunks, and dev server config.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements, mainly defining the need to add full PWA support for QuickBazar.
